description: Discovery and assessment process follows 60-day notification timeline
Breach risk assessment process completes within 24 hours of discovery
Notification planning process completes within 48 hours of discovery
Individual notification process completes without unreasonable delay
Media notification process concurrent with individual notification
Secretary notification process within 60 days of discovery
Breach log maintenance process immediately after notification
Documentation and reporting process within 90 days of discovery
Mitigation services coordination process within 30 days of notification
Post-breach follow-up process ongoing for 12-24 months
Discovery to notification timeline tracked and documented
Risk assessment timeline compliance verified and certified
